title: Quits with `render-process-gone` when joining a call
body:
**Describe the bug**

Quits when joining a call with just `render-process-gone` and no other errors in the log. 

Interestingly, turning on `disableGpu` does not resolve this problem but makes the quits occur less often. Without `disableGpu` the app quits almost every time I try to join a call.

Most likely related to https://github.com/electron/electron/issues/32760 where people suggest that a good workaround is adding `app.disableHardwareAcceleration()`. See https://github.com/electron/electron/issues/32760#issuecomment-2111717155.

This is currently not in effect when `disableGpu` is enabled. Can we introduce it and see if this helps?

https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/blob/fedf73ac4bdd1f4279c54f4f2f6e0c345e47faba/app/index.js#L124

**To Reproduce**

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to calendar
2. Click _Meet now_ on the top or _Join_ on any of the events
3. You don't get a chance to _Join now_ as the app quits when the screen with meeting controls loads

**Expected behavior**

Can join the call

n/a

 - OS: Arch
 - Installation package: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/teams-for-linux
 - Version: 1.9.0-1
